characters.description: A boy wearing a green shirt, sitting in the rear left seat with a seatbelt fastened.

characters.description: An adult male in a gray shirt sitting in the front passenger seat, not wearing a seatbelt.

summary: In this scene, an adult male is seated in the front passenger seat without a seatbelt. The rear seats are empty, and there is a bottle placed in the center console.
